long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
一款界面简单，交互友好的Http-Header修改插件。你可以一键开启/关闭header的启用。扩展程序徽标展示当前正在生效的header数量，方便实时查看请求情况。每个header都可以自定义启用/禁用、一键编辑、便增删、多行输入自动拆分、相同输入自动过滤。前往chrome应用商店搜索H-Header进行安装体验吧。
A simple, interactive and friendly Http-Header modification plug-in. You can enable/disable the header with one click.Each header can be customized to enable/disable, one-click editing, adding and deleting, automatic splitting of multi-line input, automatic filtering of the same input。Go to the chrome app store to search for H-Header for installation experience.
